title: Nanostructuring silica-iron core–shell particles in a one-step aerosol process
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18171-18180
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01154F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Delyana Ratnasari, Eka Lutfi Septiani, Asep Bayu Dani Nandiyanto, Kiet Le Anh Cao, Nobuhiro Okuda, Hiroyuki Matsumoto, Tomoyuki Hirano, Takashi Ogi
Submicron-sized core–shell Fe@SiO2 particles were successfully synthesized using a single-step aerosol technique for the first time.
